s1.ptxt: Lift up vehicle and drain oil from rear differential.
Remove rear propeller shaft referring to Propeller Shaft Removal and Installation .
Remove exhaust center pipe referring to Exhaust System Components:For Petrol Engine Model or Exhaust System Components:For Diesel Engine Model .
Remove rear drive shafts referring to Rear Drive Shaft Assembly Removal and Installation:Rear .

item.ptxt: Support rear differential with transmission jack.
Loosen rear differential mounting front bolts (1) and rear bolts (2).
Do not remove them in this step.
Remove rear suspension frame mount front bolts (1).

attention1.ptxt: Do not loosen rear suspension frame rear bolts more than 8 turns. Otherwise, rear suspension frame may fall and cause personal injury.

item.ptxt: Loosen rear suspension frame mount rear bolts gradually within 8 turns until rear differential mounting front bolts can be removed.
Remove rear differential mounting front and rear mounting bolts, and then lower rear differential.
Tighten temporarily rear suspension frame mount front and rear bolts.
Support rear differential with transmission jack.
Remove front and rear mounting bolts, and then lower rear differential.

servinfosub.title: Remounting
servinfosub.ptxt: Reverse dismounting procedure for remounting noting the following.

item.ptxt: Tighten rear differential mounting front and rear bolts to specified torque.
Tighten rear suspension frame front and rear bolts to specified torque referring to Rear Suspension Construction .
Fill rear differential oil referring to Rear Differential Oil Change:Rear .
